subtitleNullable: Brain Tumor Classification MRI Dataset into 3 type of tumor
descriptionNullable:
###Context
Brain Tumor data is widely analyzed for educational, Medical and personal interests.

###Content
The data is the collection of MRI Images of 3 types of Brain Tumor, Pituitary, Meningioma and Glioma Tumor in GrayScale Format.The training_data.pickle is a 3 channel(RGB) image of the previously bt_images folder. The labels.pickle is the label corresponding to each image. 


###Inspiration
Various Computer Vision techniques can be applied and explored to Brain Tumor images, especially for ResNet50 Architecture. I Use Transfer Learning and Fine Tuned My model. I use this data in my project.



**you can download training_data.pickle{contains all augmented images} and label.pickle, just go through attached code.**

Check this demo web app:- [https://deep-mind.herokuapp.com/](https://deep-mind.herokuapp.com/)

**Test the web app only with test images**
